website_summaries.verdict: Kids that want a speedy sled that's easy to maneuver back up hills will love this affordable sled that's built to withstand lots of winter fun.
pros: Kids can't get enough sled riding with this well-built model that goes fast and can be steered
parents love the price that won't break their budget
cons: The seat is on the small side, and only fits one child at a time

customer_reviews.title: but my 14-year-old kid is 5' 5" and 120 pounds and can fit just fine on this sled
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how big other people's 5-year-olds are, but my 14-year-old kid is 5' 5" and 120 pounds and can fit just fine on this sled. She and her friend slid all morning on this and her sled was faster than her friend's sled, so I would say that it works just fine. The price can't be beat; it's even cheaper today than when I bought it. I still think mine was a good price (less than $8). One person per sled, unless you have two tiny kids, then one each can sit on the front and back indentations. Otherwise, the big indentation is for the rear end; the small one is for the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this sled
customer_reviews.text: Slick as a seal's butt and fast. My kids love this sled. We get snow so rarely where I live, it's hardly worth it to keep a sled around. But when it does happen, you really don't want to be caught without one. We had a few days of snow this year, and Amazon was able to get this to me in time for my kids to actually use it before the snow was gone. Priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Baker

customer_reviews.title: Low weight, fine quality.
customer_reviews.text: The sleds work well and are lightweight. A group of us used them to sled back down Mt. Washington and they were pretty unbelieveably awesome. The only reason for 4 stars is that they bent fairly easily if they got caught in deeper snow...Nothing I couldn't re-bend back, but I imagine over time it might become a problem...Then again, I was sledding down Mt. Washington...
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Fast, light, durable, and affordable - time to enjoy those snow days
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons love these sleds. They are light and have easy to hold handles built right into the sled eliminating the need for a long in-the-way rope to pull it. Light enough for my 3-year old to pick it up. Durable and strong enough for grandma to sit on too! This little sled is portable so you can pop it in your trunk and take to the nearest park. Affordable enough to buy one for everyone in the family.
customer_reviews.author: W. Eckroade

customer_reviews.title: This was great and durable, for children and adults  (medium size)
customer_reviews.text: perfect for a few days in the snow. We don't play in the snow much ( maybe once or twice a year), so this is great quality with a great price. don't waste your money on something your kids will only play with once a year. I feel snow sleds are too overpriced, especially in season, but this toy will last and you won't be out money. So overly satisfied with this purchase. Kids can thrash on it all day long and we have it for next year too.
customer_reviews.author: julie burke

customer_reviews.title: Rocket? I think not!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is no rocket unless you're 5 years old, it could bearly even support a backpack with 2 bottles of water and a jacket inside it without sinking into the snow, even when on packed snow the nose just digs in..so essentially its a rocket that digs nose first into the snow..makes a decent shovel to dig some fresh sled runs though
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design. Couldn't get it to move more than halfway down the hill with either a 5-yr-old or an adult. It has two circles instead of a full body, so it has very little surface area to distribute weight and two frontal areas to cause drag. With a huge push it would get the kid halfway down after turning sideways every time. +1 star because it seems sturdy, product photo wasn't misleading and it might be great on ice.
customer_reviews.author: kghastie

customer_reviews.title: Great little sleds!
customer_reviews.text: This was a new style sled for us this year. We purchased two and used them all day. They did not work well for adults but kids looooved them! They were choice over our other sleds for the kids so that makes them a hit for us. Can't speak to durability yet but I never expect more than a season of weekly use from any plastic sleds.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Dafoe

customer_reviews.title: The kids love them! They look like they'll hold up pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids love them! They look like they'll hold up pretty well, too. Easy to steer. If the kids are happy with them, I am happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Missa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected. Thick plastic. Bigger than I thought it would be. My 9 year olds have no problems fitting on it. Big enough for a teenager or adult under 170 lbs. I'm not sure how durable the handles will be, they flex a bit and may crack after a few uses. But good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle

customer_reviews.title: For only $10 and they had a great time. Still in great shape after a few ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids had a blast on this thing sledding down the hills up north. For only $10 and they had a great time. Still in great shape after a few hours of sledding and will be good to go for several more trips to the snow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: too small for a normal size kid over the age of 6
customer_reviews.author: Robert Murray

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: maybe it will work better on a steep hill, but this didn't have a lot of glide to it. We tried using a rope to help it along, but it wasn't very fast.
customer_reviews.author: egazay

customer_reviews.title: Strong sled that's great for younger kids.
customer_reviews.text: This sled has outlasted all of our other sleds. Even the red metal saucer sled that we have. The metal one looks like it went through a war but this one still looks great 5 years later. It's just faded from being stored outside all these years in this chicago weather. It goes a little slower so the older kids don't like it as but I just donated it to the boys next door and I bet it lasts another 5 years. Perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Razrd

customer_reviews.title: It's good for a small kid
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap sled. It's good for a small kid. Our 2 and 8 year old boys have a lot of fun! No bigger kids though.
customer_reviews.author: April T

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Giving as a gift. Seemed very sturdy. I believe it should last the winter and more in my 7yo grandson’s hands
customer_reviews.author: Charles Stokinger

customer_reviews.title: Goes fast.
customer_reviews.text: This sled goes really well my granddaughter loves it. Easy to Cary up hill. ,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sleds
customer_reviews.text: My kids said they were the best sled yet! Bought for my 12 year old son and 10 year old daughter. They love them. They are easy to drift and turn going down the hill.
customer_reviews.author: Caleigh King

customer_reviews.title: No Go in the Snow
customer_reviews.text: This item is sturdy, but it didn't work well for my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Did the job for the kids to have fun. Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Did the job for the kids to have fun. Better than I expected. Not for long term use. Price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J.

customer_reviews.title: Good sled
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for kids after the snow was packed down.
customer_reviews.author: Mom-Mamaw

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids. Usually our sleds break fast but this one lasted all winter.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: small but basic enough for a kid about 4-8 or 9
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite snow sled!
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite snow sled! Very smooth and fast :) We came back and bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa :)

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleds
customer_reviews.text: Fun little sled , came as a two pack I didn't know that when purchased. I rode it at 6'. 290lbs went furthest down the runs.
customer_reviews.author: bob d

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love them
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids fought over the first one we bought them, so we had to buy another one! They love them!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Kay Carroll

customer_reviews.title: The kids love the sled and being able to steer with the
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly even with the holiday rush, and the product was exactly as described. The kids love the sled and being able to steer with the handles
customer_reviews.author: Ken Burke

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This has not worked in any type of snow nor with a small child or an adult as rider. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Not for use on sand dunes
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use at the sand dunes. Didn't work at all, even when coated on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY HENRY

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed with the sled
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed with the sled. Way small. Our kids aren't big or tall and this will maybe work for the middle child. I wld say these are for kids 5 and under.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Family tested and loved
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a chance to use these with the snow that came through this weekend. My boys loved riding these, and they did great even with them being young and smaller in frame. They seemed to have no problems staying on them or getting them to slide easily. Very happy with the price point too!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Culver III

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Not very kid-friendly to use. Difficult to grasp and slide. It looks to be made of study plastic. Bought it just this winter, will see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great Sled
customer_reviews.text: This was a very sturdy sled and my 7 yr old nephew was extremely happy to be the recipient at Christmas. We can not wait for some additional snow to come so we can spend the day with our new sleds.
customer_reviews.author: J.C. Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it will Crack with only one or two
customer_reviews.text: Smaller seating area than expected. Seems like it will Crack with only one or two uses
customer_reviews.author: BobsYourUncle

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: this sled works best in hard packed snow conditions but is workable in a new snow covering. got to try it!
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Sled!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality! Great color and feel. Lightweight makes it easy to store. The kids love it, so I love it:) Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: billy bigguns

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Have not gotten snow yet but based on the price and apparent quality I think this is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: D Sims

customer_reviews.title: Great for packed snow.  Not so much for powder.
customer_reviews.text: Great sled as long as you don't want to use it on powder. Great if the snow is packed or groomed. Not fun on fresh, deep powder. My daughter loves the sled and it is light enough for her to carry up the hill on her own. It was a big hit, but only after the snow was packed down. Until then, the sled did not move and was frustrating. As long as you know that, everything will be fine. Recommended as long as you know it's limitations.
customer_reviews.author: Geough

customer_reviews.title: Cute sled
customer_reviews.text: The kids had a blast with this sled! Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ann Hamer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the little kids.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a prize for our Scout Pack. Nice sled, a little smaller than expected but then again, the measurements are shown. It'll work great for the little kids. I cannot tell you how it goes in the snow because we don't have snow. . .. yet! But it's comin'.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O.

customer_reviews.title: Cool AirHead Sled
customer_reviews.text: We are having RECORD heat and no snow yet, so I haven't got to try it out, but it looks good and is made well!
customer_reviews.author: L-Ditty

product_meta.title: Airhead Rocket Plastic Snow Sled
product_meta.description: Lightweight sled made from high impact plastic that won't crack in the cold weather. Hand cutouts allow you to control your ride and steer away from danger. Measures 34in X 20in X 4in
feature_bullets: Made with high impact plastic construction
Molded plastic handles allow the rider to steer down the hill

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
